Title: Wpf PdfReader
Description: This is a pdf reader, development based WPF and MuPDF,You can use the keyboard to operate it.This is pdf reader can save the user's open records.
HomeWiki:
WPF PDF reader

This is a pdf reader, development based WPF and MuPDF,You can use the keyboard to operate it.This is pdf reader can save the user's open records.

Keyboard Shortcuts

A: previous page
S: next page
D: Zoom out
F: Zoom in
I,J: previous page
K,L: next page
+: Zoom in
- : Zoom out
PgUp: previous page
PgDn: next page
↑:scroll to top
↓:scroll to bottom
←:scroll to left
→:scroll to right
F1: about
F11: Full screen
Esc:Exit program
Space:go back
B:Add Bookmark
M:Manage Bookmarks
Ctrl+E:Export current page to png
use keyboard to enter number for example(123) then knock G,then goto the page 123

System shortcut menu

You can right click pdf file in desktop or other folders ,then select 'Wpf PdfReader' menu to open the pdf file.
You can drag a pdf file and drop to open it

System Screenshot











B:Add bookmark

M:Manage bookmarks

Mouse scroll page down and up,also turn page

Export current page to png
